movieDescription: Details: Directed: Shankar Bhanu Stars: Tejus Kancherla, Paayal Rajput, Dr V.K. Naresh, Nagineedu, Adityamenon Dialogues: Parashuram Lyrics: Bhaskar Bhatla Editor: Prawin Pudi Choreographer: Ganesh Swamy Executive Producer: Chinna D.O.P: C Ram Prasad Music: Radhan Co-Producer: C V Rao Producer: C Kalyan

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Ravi Kiran Kola
Starring by: Kiran Abbavaram, Rahasya Gorak, Rajkumar Kasireddy
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Raja(Kiran Abbavaram) is in neck-deep love with his childhood crush Rani(Rahasya Gorak). But his problem is that he cannot express his feelings to her. Things come to a stage when Rani leaves her village and goes away for higher studies for over three years. But Raja’s love for her never dies. Finally, Rani comes back to the village and happily ends up with Raja.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: T.N. Santhosh
Starring by: Nikhil Siddhartha, Lavanya Tripathi, Vennela Kishore
Genres: Action, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Arjun Suravaram (Nikhil) is an investigative journalist who works for a channel called TV 99. He falls in love with his colleague (Lavanya) and when everything seems to be going fine, he suddenly gets arrested in a fake certificate scam. Arjun comes out on bail and to his shock, finds out that a big mafia is behind all this.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Anthony Maras
Written by: John Collee, Anthony Maras
Starring by: Dev Patel, Armie Hammer, Nazanin Boniadi
Genres: Drama, History, Thriller
Country: Australia, USA, India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: A gripping true story of humanity and heroism, HOTEL MUMBAI vividly recounts the 2008 siege of the famed Taj Hotel by a group of terrorists in Mumbai, India. Among the dedicated hotel staff is the renowned chef Hemant Oberoi (Anupam Kher) and a waiter (Academy Award-Nominee Dev Patel, Slumdog Millionaire) who choose to risk their lives to protect their guests. As the world watches on, a desperate couple (Armie Hammer, Call Me By Your Name and Nazanin Boniadi, “Homeland”) is forced to make unthinkable sacrifices to protect their newborn child.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Hemanth Karthik
Starring by: Ajay, Anurag Konidena, Kairavi Thakkar
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Gautham (Anurag) is an orphan raised by an Army major. Swapna (Swetha) is a college student from Hyderabad who loses the diary that Gautham finds it. He starts reading it and falls in love with her. Rest of the story is Will Gautam meets Swapna and express his love.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sudheer Varma
Written by: Arjun, Carthyk
Starring by: Sharvanand, Kajal Aggarwal, Kalyani Priyadarshan
Genres: Action, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The film is set in Vizag where Deva(Sharwanand) and his friends sell black tickets. During this time, Sharwa falls in love with Geetha(Kalyani Priyadarshan).When everything seems to be going fine, Deva locks horns with the local MLA(Murali Sharma) and enters the illegal liquor business. As expected, the game changes and a tug of war starts. Sharwa grows big in the business but is still being targeted by someone all the time.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Abdul Majith
Starring by: Sada, Rithvika, Thirumurugan
Genres: Drama, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Srimathi 21f, set in the 80s and 90s, is about the travails of sex workers. Majith says he researched the subject for around three months before going into production. “Through various contacts, we found and spoke with sex workers in places like Salem, Namakkal, Nellai and nearby places.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Agasthya Manju, Ram Gopal Varma
Written by: Narendra Chary, Ram Gopal Varma
Starring by: Rajsekhar Aningi, P. Vijay Kumar, Yagna Shetty
Genres: Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Lakshmi`s NTR explores some of the darkest and most secretive chapters in the personal and political life of legendary actor N.T. Rama Rao, and the events that unfolded following his marriage to Lakshmi Parvati. Directd by Ram Gopal Varma, the film stars P. Vijay Kumar and Yagna Shetty in central roles.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Basava Shankar Eeday
Starring by: Keshav Deepak, Rakesh Varre, Gargeyi
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Hari (Rakesh Varre), who has a different approach towards life falls for a girl called Harathi(Gargeyi Yellapragada). Eventually, he tries to impress her and within no time, love blooms between them. But the main conflict in their love story raises because of the heroine’s father who has a hardcore caste feeling issue with the boy.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Lokesh Kanagaraj
Starring by: Karthi, Narain, George Maryan, Ramana
Genres: Action, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: In order to kill a group of five cops, who seize crores worth of drugs, a drug-dealing gang targets the police intelligence office with the help of an informer. In the process, they supply drugs based liquor to a private police party. To rescue them an officer named Vijay(Narain) takes the help of a just-released prisoner Delhi(Karthi).

movieInfo:
Directed by: T Prabhakar
Starring by: Bitthiri Sathi, Priya, Anurag Parvathaneni
Genres: Comedy, Drama
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Thupaki Ramudu (Bithiri Sathi) is an orphan and a naive simpleton who is insulted by the villagers as a worthless man. He decides to get educated but fails to get someone to teach him. Anitha (Priya), a girl new to the village agrees to educate him and he starts liking her. Everything goes well till he comes to know a truth about Anitha and her past.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Rohin Venkatesan
Starring by: Tamannaah Bhatia, Munishkanth Ramadoss, Kaali Venkat
Genres: Comedy, Horror, Suspense
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Meera (Tamannaah) and her foster family of three, live in a bungalow and start to doubt that it’s haunted. Meanwhile, prospective buyers, who visit the property claim there are ghosts in it. Four strangers strike a deal with the owner Shankar (Prem) to stay there for four nights to unravel the mystery. A series of confusions terrifies both the humans and ghosts alike.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Vishwanath Maganti
Starring by: Rajendra Prasad, Vennela Kishore, Harshitha,Viswant
Genres: Drama, Family, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Sodala Raju(Rajendra Prasad) is a well-known man in his village. His last wish is to get his granddaughter and grandson settle down in life. The twist in the tale arises when Sodala Raju passes away all of a sudden. He comes back as a spirit and finds it disturbing to see his family quarreling for his property.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Surrender Reddy
Written by: Sai Madhav Burra, Gopalakrishna Paruchuri
Starring by: Amitabh Bachchan, Chiranjeevi, Vijay Sethupathi, Nayanthara
Genres: Action, Drama, History, War
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The film is based in 1846 when the British Empire is torchering the Indians and taking away all their hard owned income. Renadu is a place in Rayalaseema which does not bend down to the atrocities of the British and one man Narasimha Reddy(Chiranjeevi) stands tall in his revolt against the British.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Alexandre Aja
Written by: Michael Rasmussen, Shawn Rasmussen
Starring by: Kaya Scodelario, Barry Pepper, Ross Anderson
Genres: Action, Adventure, Horror, Thriller
Country: USA
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: A young woman, while attempting to save her father during a category 5 hurricane, finds herself trapped in a flooding house and must fight for her life against alligators.

movieName: Dora and the Lost City of Gold
movieInfo:
Directed by: James Bobin
Written by: Chris Gifford, Matthew Robinson
Starring by: Isabela Moner, Eugenio Derbez, Michael Peña
Genres: Adventure, Family
Country: Australia, USA
Language: English
movieDescription: Having spent most of her life exploring the jungle with her parents, nothing could prepare Dora for her most dangerous adventure ever: high school. Always the explorer, Dora quickly finds herself leading Boots, Diego, a mysterious jungle inhabitant, and a ragtag group of teens on a live-action adventure to save her parents and solve the impossible mystery behind a lost Inca civilization.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: K.V.R. Mahendra
Starring by: Anand Deverakonda, Shivathmika Rajashekar, Kishore
Genres: Drama, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Set in the Telangana backdrop, Dorasaani deals with the story of a rich girl and an underdog. Raju (Anand Deverakonda) falls for his village princess Devaki (Shivathmika) and tries to woo her with his poems. Impressed with Raju, Dorassani instantly connects with him and eventually they both fall in deep love.
